IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO REALIZE AND SUSTAIN THE EDUCATIONAL AND PHILANTHROPIC VALUES OF ALPHA CHI OMEGA THROUGH SUCCESSFUL FUNDRAISING AND STEWARDSHIP.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THROUGH THE REAL.STRONG.WOMEN. EXPERIENCE, ALPHA CHI OMEGA CULTIVATES IMPACTFUL COMMUNITIES WHERE WOMEN ARE INSPIRED TO CONNECT, LEAD, GROW AND SERVE. THE ALPHA CHI OMEGA FOUNDATION STRIVES TO REALIZE AND SUSTAIN THE EDUCATIONAL AND PHILANTHROPIC VALUES OF ALPHA CHI OMEGA THROUGH SUCCESSFUL FUNDRAISING AND STEWARDSHIP. GENEROUS GIFTS FROM OUR MEMBERS AND FRIENDS ENHANCE THE REAL. STRONG. WOMEN. EXPERIENCE AND EMPOWER OUR MEMBERS TO IMPACT THEIR COMMUNITIES AND WORLD POSITIVELY.
IRS990.Desc: GRANTS TO FRATERNITY: PROVIDE GRANTS TO THE ALPHA CHI OMEGA FRATERNITY TO SUPPORT EDUCATIONAL AND PHILANTHROPIC PROGRAMS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: CHAPTER HOUSING GRANTS: PROVIDE GRANTS TO THE ALPHA CHI OMEGA NATIONAL HOUSING CORPORATION AND ALPHA CHI OMEGA LOCAL HOUSING CORPORATIONS IN SUPPORT OF THE EDUCATIONAL PORTION OF CHAPTER HOUSING IMPROVEMENT PROJECTS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: COMMUNITY IMPACT: ALPHA CHI OMEGA WORKS THROUGHOUT THE NATION TO BUILD AWARENESS OF DOMESTIC VIOLENCE. CHAPTERS WORK WITH LOCAL DOMESTIC VIOLENCE ORGANIZATIONS TO RAISE FUNDS AND AWARENESS. THE EDUCATION AND LEADERSHIP INITIATIVES DEPARTMENT DEVELOPS NATIONAL OPPORTUNITIES TO SUPPORT THIS CAUSE AND ASSISTS INDIVIDUAL CHAPTERS IN THEIR EFFORTS. MAJOR FUNDRAISING INITIATIVES OCCUR IN OCTOBER (DOMESTIC VIOLENCE AWARENESS MONTH) AND FEBRUARY (HEALTHY RELATIONSHIPS WEEK).

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: SCHOLARSHIPS AND EDUCATIONAL ASSISTANCE: PROVIDE SCHOLARSHIPS AND MEMBER ASSISTANCE GRANTS SUPPORTING ALPHA CHI OMEGA MEMBERS IN THEIR EDUCATIONAL PURSUITS AND OTHER AREAS OF NEED.
CHAPTER EDUCATION FUNDS: PROVIDE GRANTS TO ALPHA CHI OMEGA CHAPTERS FOR EXPENSES ASSOCIATED WITH EDUCATIONAL OR PHILANTHROPIC INITIATIVES

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION'S ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE HELD FOR SPECIFIC PURPOSES AS DESIGNATED BY THE DONORS. THESE PURPOSES INCLUDE EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS FOR MEMBERS, MEMBER SCHOLARSHIPS (SOMETIMES LIMITED TO SPECIFIC CHAPTERS OR GEOGRAPHIC REGIONS), CHAPTER HOUSING IMPROVEMENTS (SOMETIMES LIMITED TO SPECIFIC CHAPTER HOUSES) AND STAFF EDUCATION ASSISTANCE. THE FOUNDATION ENSURES THAT EACH ENDOWED FUND IS SPENT IN ACCORDANCE WITH ITS DONOR'S INTENT BY DEVELOPING AN ANNUAL SPENDING PLAN FOR EACH FUND WHICH IS CLOSELY REVIEWED BY STAFF AND THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES PRIOR TO RELEASING AND SPENDING THE FUNDS EACH YEAR.

THE FOUNDATION IS ORGANIZED AS A NOT-FOR-PROFIT CORPORATION THAT IS EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE UNITED STATES INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND SIMILAR STATE LAW. ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES GENERALLY ACCEPTED IN THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA REQUIRE MANAGEMENT TO EVALUATE TAX POSITIONS TAKEN BY THE FOUNDATION AND RECOGNIZE A TAX LIABILITY IF THE FOUNDATION HAS TAKEN AN UNCERTAIN POSITION THAT MORE LIKELY THAN NOT WOULD NOT BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION BY VARIOUS FEDERAL AND STATE TAXING AUTHORITIES. MANAGEMENT HAS ANALYZED THE TAX POSITIONS TAKEN BY THE FOUNDATION, AND HAS CONCLUDED THAT AS OF JULY 31, 2023 AND 2022, THERE ARE NO UNCERTAIN POSITIONS TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN THAT WOULD REQUIRE RECOGNITION OF A LIABILITY OR DISCLOSURE IN THE ACCOMPANYING FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE FOUNDATION IS SUBJECT TO ROUTINE AUDITS BY TAXING JURISDICTIONS; HOWEVER, THERE ARE CURRENTLY NO AUDITS FOR ANY TAX PERIODS IN PROGRESS. THE FOUNDATION HAS FILED ITS FEDERAL AND STATE INCOME TAX RETURNS FOR PERIODS THROUGH JULY 31, 2021. THESE INCOME TAX RETURNS ARE GENERALLY OPEN TO EXAMINATION BY THE RELEVANT TAXING AUTHORITIES FOR A PERIOD OF THREE YEARS FROM THE LATER OF THE DATE THE RETURN WAS FILED OR ITS DUE DATE (INCLUDING APPROVED EXTENSIONS).
CHANGE IN CASH SURRENDER VALUE OF L -2,332. CHANGE IN VALUE OF BENEFICIAL INTER -564,145.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GRANTS ARE ADMINISTERED BY ALPHA CHI OMEGA FOUNDATION STAFF MEMBERS WITH THE ASSISTANCE OF VOLUNTEER COMMITTEES. EACH TYPE OF GRANT HAS SPECIFIC CRITERIA THAT MUST BE MET IN ORDER FOR A GRANT TO BE AWARDED. ONCE A GRANT IS ACCEPTED, A GRANT ACCEPTANCE AGREEMENT IS SIGNED BY THE GRANT RECIPIENT WHICH INCLUDES THE FOLLOWING LANGUAGE: "IF, FOR ANY REASON, YOU WILL NO LONGER USE THE GRANT FOR THE ORIGINALLY-SPECIFIED PURPOSE OR ARE UNABLE TO ACCEPT THE GRANT, THE GRANT MUST BE REPAID TO THE ALPHA CHI OMEGA FOUNDATION". OUTSTANDING GRANT AWARDS ARE MONITORED BY FOUNDATION STAFF MEMBERS ON A QUARTERLY BASIS AND DOCUMENTATION IS REQUIRED TO SUBSTANTIATE THAT THE FUNDS WERE USED AS SPECIFIED IN THE GRANT AWARD. THE ALPHA CHI OMEGA FRATERNITY PROVIDES A REPORT TO THE FOUNDATION'S BOARD OF TRUSTEES AT THE END OF EACH FISCAL YEAR DETAILING HOW THE GRANT FUNDS WERE SPENT.

CERTAIN OFFICERS OF THE ORGANIZATION ARE COMPENSATED THROUGH ALPHA CHI OMEGA FRATERNITY. THE FRATERNITY IS UNRELATED TO THE FOUNDATION FOR 990 REPORTING PURPOSES. TOTAL COMPENSATION FROM THE FRATERNITY TO KATIE GAFFIN AS CEO WAS $231,922 FOR CALENDAR YEAR 2022, $34,788 OF WHICH IS FOR SERVICES RENDERED TO THE FOUNDATION. TOTAL COMPENSATION TO JULIE GOLDSBERRY AS SENIOR FINANCIAL CONTROLLER WAS $134,121 FOR CALENDAR YEAR 2021, $13,412 OF WHICH IS FOR SERVICES RENDERED TO THE FOUNDATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BYLAWS WERE AMENDED WITH THE FOLLOWING CHANGES: - THE IMMEDIATE PAST NATIONAL PRESIDENT WAS REMOVED AS A TRUSTEE. - THE NUMBER OF ALUMNAE TRUSTEES WAS LOWERED TO 7 FROM 8

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THIS FORM 990 WAS PREPARED BY A PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM AND REVIEWED IN DETAIL BY THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCE STAFF. THE FORM WAS THEN SENT TO ALL MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES FOR REVIEW. THE FORM WAS APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES AT A REGULAR MONTHLY MEETING PRIOR TO BEING FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MONITORS AND ENFORCES COMPLIANCE WITH ITS CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY BY REQUIRING ALL BOARD OF TRUSTEE MEMBERS TO COMPLETE AN ANNUAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST AND DISCLOSURE STATEMENT. ANY DISCLOSED CONFLICTS ARE REVIEWED AND RESOLVED BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES PRESIDENT IN CONSULTATION WITH THE CHIEF DEVELOPMENT OFFICER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COMPENSATION OF ALPHA CHI OMEGA'S CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER (CEO) IS SET BY ALPHA CHI OMEGA FRATERNITY'S NATIONAL COUNCIL. THE COMPENSATION OF THE SENIOR FINANCIAL CONTROLLER (SFC) IS SET BY THE CEO AND REVIEWED BY THE NATIONAL COUNCIL FOR REASONABLENESS. THE FRATERNITY ACTS AS THE COMMON PAYMASTER FOR ALL FOUR ALPHA CHI OMEGA ENTITIES AND ALLOCATES A PORTION OF THE CEO'S AND SFC'S SALARY TO EACH ENTITY. BENCHMARK DATA RELATED TO THE CEO'S AND SFC'S COMPENSATION IS OBTAINED ANNUALLY BY THE NATIONAL COUNCIL FROM SEVERAL PUBLISHED SALARY SURVEYS. THE NATIONAL COUNCIL REVIEW THE BENCHMARK DATA AND ENSURES THAT THE DATA POINTS ARE COMPARABLE TO ALPHA CHI OMEGA'S CEO AND SFC POSITIONS. THE NATIONAL COUNCIL THEN MEETS IN EXECUTIVE SESSION (WITHOUT ANY STAFF MEMBERS PRESENT), COMPARES APPROPRIATE BENCHMARK DATA POINTS TO THE CEO AND SFC'S ACTUAL COMPENSATION, DETERMINES CHANGES TO THE CEO'S COMPENSATION IF APPROPRIATE, CONFIRMS REASONABLENESS OF THE SFC'S COMPENSATION AND DIRECTS THE FRATERNITY'S PAYROLL STAFF TO MAKE CHANGES TO THE CEO'S COMPENSATION AS APPROPRIATE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.

THE CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER IS COMPENSATED THOUGH THE ALPHA CHI OMEGA FRATERNITY, BUT ALSO SERVES AS THE CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER OF ALPHA CHI OMEGA NATIONAL HOUSING CORPORATION (NHC) AND ALPHA CHI OMEGA FOUNDATION, INC. (FOUNDATION). THE NHC AND FOUNDATION REIMBURSE THE FRATERNITY FOR A PERCENTAGE OF THE CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER'S SALARY AND BENEFITS. THE FOUNDATION IS UNRELATED TO THE FRATERNITY BY DEFINITION, THEREFORE, NO COMPENSATION IS REPORTED IN PART VII. HOWEVER, THE AMOUNT OF REIMBURSED SALARY IS REFLECTED ON PART IX, LINE 5, OFFICER'S COMPENSATION.
